abstract: Michelle Higgins Practical Traveler column; high-end safari camps are luring customers with discounted packages; deals are not expected to last, but offer some of the cheapest prices ever for adventure travel in four African countries.
snippet: After lowering prices amid the recession, high-end safari camps are luring customers with discounted deals as much as 40 percent off.
lead_paragraph: After lowering prices amid the recession, high-end safari camps are luring customers with discounted deals as much as 40 percent off.

headline.main: For Now, It’s a Cheaper Safari
headline.print_headline: For Now, It’s a Cheaper Safari
headline.seo: Where to Find the Best Safari Deals
